definitions.definition: Safe and comfortable , where humans , or other animals , can live ; fit for habitation .
examples: After we found the freshwater spring we were more confident that the place was habitable .
Humankind has never found any other habitable planets apart from Earth.

definitions.definition: Of an astronomical object: capable of supporting, or giving rise to, life.

main_definition: Safe and comfortable , where humans , or other animals , can live ; fit for habitation .
secondary_definitions: Of an astronomical object: capable of supporting, or giving rise to, life.
